paper.title: A context dependent equivalence between processes

author.org: Aalborg University Center, Aalborg C, Demark#TAB#

paper.abstract: In recent years several equivalences between nondeterministic and concurrent processes have been proposed in order to capture different notions of the extensional behaviour of a process. Usually the equivalences are congruences wrt the process constructing operations in order to support hierarchic development of systems. With the purpose of achieving more flexible hierarchic development methods we suggest parameterizing the equivalences with information about contexts. We carry out the suggestion in full for the bisimulation equivalence, which we parameterize with a special type of context information called environments. As a Main Theorem we offer a useful characterization of the information ordering on environments. Also a Modal Characterization of the parameterized bisimulation equivalence is presented.
